title: As You Lay Sleeping
description: ‘Gripping. Thrilling. On the edge of your seat exciting. I absolutely loved it.’ - Red’s Midnight ReadersI did it all for you…Cara’s boyfriend is dead.When fingers start pointing at her, she knows she’s in more trouble than she originally thought. Because Cara can see that something isn’t right.As her carefully constructed life begins to crumble, Cara isn’t sure who she is anymore.But maybe that’s exactly what someone wants her to think…What reviewers are saying about AS YOU LAY SLEEPING‘I was completely glued from page one and didn’t want to put it down’ – Artistic Bent‘If you want a book that will leave you guessing until almost the very end, this is the story for you… A mind-bending thriller’ – For the Love of Books
author: Katlyn Duncan
